titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Weatherhouse - 1947-11-08 - Part 2 // Peacock Rag

mods.abstract: Part 2 of excerpts from a Weatherhouse sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (10:15-10:30 pm) from November 8, 1947. Featuring David Cobb (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Jimmy Riddle, Pap's Jug Band, and Tommy Jackson. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. Followed by a fiddle tune of unknown origin.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
